**Anime** : (Ex : Darling in the FranXX)
**Song type** : (Ex: Opening 1)
**Season** : (Ex: Winter 2018)
**Title** : (Ex: Kiss of Death) 
**Singer** :  (Ex: Mika Nakashima)
**Spotify link** : (Ex : https://open.spotify.com/track/5783FVFtXJMM094CCdHPC5 )
